pages.text: Wandering Mage is a vendor used to purchase spell forms, can be traded with spirit crystals. Unlike ordinary villagers, mages have certain qualifications for using magick power, so they can deal with those bad guys who want to bully them. In short, I don't recommend you to provoke him.
Wandering Mage can spawn naturally in suitable biomes, and can also place a magic crafting for the villagers to make the villagers become to mages.
